name: INFILTRATE: Babel
description:
Infiltrate: Babel is a single player dungeon crawler game set in ancient Babylon. The human race united following the Great Flood, speaking one and the same language. Migrating eastward, they stumble upon the land of Shinar. Here, they agree to build a city known as Babylon, and a tower tall enough to reach the heavens.

You play as a lower class man as you attempt to infiltrate and climb the tower, avoiding guards and making your way to the top of the tower. What consequences will your actions have? And what lies at the top of the tower?
